channel.title: Short Stories | Tales of Murder
channel.description: A murder mystery, crime and detective fiction website.

item.title: The Finger of Guilt
item.author: atticus@talesofmurder.com (J. J. Stagg)
item.description: There was, at the time, an epidemic of jewelry robberies. The pestilence had attacked Scofield's six times in four months; but the disease never "took." The six hold-ups failed and in every instance the robbers were caught. But would Judson Farris succeed where others had failed?
